title: The Washington Post's Correction to Homicide Closure Rate
body:
As homicides fall in D.C., rise in Prince George’s, numbers meet in the middleBy Allison Klein and Matt Zapotosky, Published: December 31double-digit dropEast of the River Clergy, Police, Community Partnershipgrabbing smartphones, computer tabletsBrittany Norwoodbludgeoned and stabbedJayna Murray.teen was shot on a busy streeton Halloween nightViola Drath was killedgunned down outside a nightclub
